p: Formaldehyde (100 mL) was dissolved in 900 mL of distilled water and 4 g of sodium dihydrogen phosphate. Disodium hydrogen phosphate (6.5 g) was added to the solution. The pH was adjusted to 7.0 and stored in a closed container. Danshen tablets were ground to a powder, and a 0.5 g/kg solution was prepared using normal saline and stored at 4 °C.
